          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "/* Defines a conditional `printf` macro, which only prints if `DEBUG`\n * has been defined\n */\n#ifdef DEBUG\n#define DLOG(x) (printf(x))\n#else\n#define DLOG(x)\n#endif"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1

          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "#if defined(SerOpPluAllRead)\n// forward declare the replacement function which we will call once we create our log.\nSHORT    SerOpPluAllRead_Special(PLUIF *pPif, USHORT usLockHnd);\n\nSHORT    SerOpPluAllRead_Debug(PLUIF *pPif, USHORT usLockHnd, char *aszFilePath, int nLineNo)\n{\n    int iLen = 0;\n    char  xBuffer[256];\n\n    // only print the last 30 characters of the file name to shorten the logs.\n    iLen = strlen (aszFilePath);\n    if (iLen > 30) {\n        iLen = iLen - 30;\n    }\n    else {\n        iLen = 0;\n    }\n\n    sprintf (xBuffer, \"SerOpPluAllRead_Debug(): husHandle = %d, File %s, lineno = %d\", pPif->husHandle, aszFilePath + iLen, nLineNo);\n    IssueDebugLog(xBuffer);\n\n    // now that we have issued the log, continue with standard processing.\n    return SerOpPluAllRead_Special(pPif, usLockHnd);\n}\n\n// our special replacement function name for when we are generating logs.\nSHORT    SerOpPluAllRead_Special(PLUIF *pPif, USHORT usLockHnd)\n#else\n// standard, normal function name (signature) that is replaced with our debug version.\nSHORT   SerOpPluAllRead(PLUIF *pPif, USHORT usLockHnd)\n#endif\n{\n    if (STUB_SELF == SstReadAsMaster()) {\n        return OpPluAllRead(pPif, usLockHnd);\n    } \n    return OP_NOT_MASTER;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "So using conditional compilation you can have something like the following in the include file declaring the function. This replaces the standard version of the function with a debug version of the function. The preprocessor is used to replace calls to the function "
              ],
              ["SerOpPluAllRead()", [["c"]]],
              [" with calls to the function "],
              ["SerOpPluAllRead_Debug()", [["c"]]],
              [
                " with two additional arguments, the name of the file and the line number of where the function is used."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "d2c076e0-78c2-4085-8251-ffae32817dbc": {

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "The definition of the function would look something like the following. What this source does is to request that the preprocessor rename the function "
              ],
              ["SerOpPluAllRead()", [["c"]]],
              [" to be "],
              ["SerOpPluAllRead_Debug()", [["c"]]],
              [
                " and to modify the argument list to include two additional arguments, a pointer to the name of the file where the function was called and the line number in the file at which the function is used."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }

            "title": [
              ["The "],
              ["#if", [["c"]]],
              [" directives behaves similar to the C "],
              ["if", [["c"]]],
              [
                " statement, it shall only contain integral constant expressions, and no casts. It supports one additional unary operator, "
              ],
              ["defined( identifier )", [["c"]]],
              [", which returns "],
              ["1", [["c"]]],
              [" if the identifier is defined, and "],
              ["0", [["c"]]],
              [" otherwise."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
